images.caption: Figure 1:LoRACode Architecture: The input consists of code-code or text-code pairs. The base models are enhanced with LoRA layers, that output pooled embeddings, optimized using the Contrastive Trainer to improve retrieval accuracy. Finally, Mean Reciprocal Rank (MRR) measures the quality of ranked retrieval results.
Figure 2:Bar Graph showing the trends of MRR and NDCG for Base and LoRA models across different programming languages for Text2Code search.
